title: At the Black Gate
author: VD
content_html: Small bloggers rejoice! If the New York Times can be believed, one’s literary ambitions are best served by keeping one’s daily readership under 1k per day.
content_text:
Small bloggers
rejoice
!  If the New York Times can be believed, one’s literary ambitions are best served by keeping one’s daily readership under 1k per day.
